questions.frequency: How often are you feeling them?
questions.duration: How long do the episodes last?
questions.associated_symptoms: Do you have chest pain, shortness of breath, dizziness, or fainting?
questions.cardiac_history: Do you have heart disease, arrhythmia, or structural heart problems?
questions.triggers: What seems to trigger them? (caffeine, exercise, stress)

triage_rules.expression: ('chest pain' in str(associated_symptoms).lower() or 'faint' in str(associated_symptoms).lower() or 'dizz' in str(associated_symptoms).lower())
triage_rules.reason: Palpitations with concerning symptoms - Possible arrhythmia - Immediate Emergency Care Required
Continuous palpitations with cardiac history - Emergency evaluation needed
